API: Openpolitici ResourcesÂ¶

Resources may be instance or list.

  • Locations
    • Location instance
    • Locations list
  • Politicians
    • Politician instance
    • Politicians list
  • Decision Makers
    • Decision makers list
  • Similarity
    • Similarity list

These API are already implemented and need documentation:

  • professions
  • education levels
  • institutions
  • charge types
  • statistics
  • cityreps
  • historical_city_mayor
  • historical_location_government
  • current_city_mayor
  • current_location_government
